summary: A former sheriff blames himself for his wife's death during a Wells Fargo robbery and vows to track down and kill the seven men responsible.
cast: Randolph Scott|Gail Russell|Lee Marvin|Walter Reed|John Larch|Don 'Red' Barry|Fred Graham|John Beradino|John Phillips|Chuck Roberson|Stuart Whitman|Pamela Duncan|Steve Mitchell|Cliff Lyons|Fred Sherman|Chet Brandenburg|Chick Hannan|Cap Somers|George Sowards
title: Tras la pista de los asesinos
